name: Leslie Mann
description:
Shiksas of Hollywood!

Can't get that juicy role? Think of giving it up? Do you fear that the power of your good looks is waning?

Fear no more! Have we got a solution for you! Marry a Jewish director!

Look how well it worked out for Kate Capshaw Leslie Mann! She was just a struggling actress, and then she met Judd Apatow, and â€” bang! And we're not just talking background roles! Slowly but surely, Mann is going from having a few lines to playing best friends to leading lady status! All thanks to Apatow! (Him casting her in every single one of his movies is not hurting, obviously.)

And here's a dirty secret, shiksas of Hollywood:

You don't even have to convert!
